definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: He has also crushed my teeth with gravel; He has covered me with ashes.
sentences.chinese: 又用沙石磣斷我的牙，用灰塵將我蒙蓋。

sentences.english: He hath also broken my teeth with gravel stones, he hath covered me with ashes.
sentences.chinese: 他又用沙石磣斷我的牙，用灰塵將我矇蔽。

sentences.english: Yellow sandstone and masses of coralline limestone abounded.
sentences.chinese: 黃色沙石和珊瑚石巖滿地都是。

sentences.english: Sha Shi is a very unique North-American Chinese writer.
sentences.chinese: 在北美華文文學中，沙石是個較爲特殊的作家。

sentences.english: Don't dump that sand in the middle of the path.
sentences.chinese: 不要把沙石亂倒在走道中央。

sentences.english: But the sand and rocks here stained with thousands of years of warfare.
sentences.chinese: 但是那裏的沙石，經歷上千年的戰爭。

sentences.english: They can stop the wind from blowing up sand and earth.
sentences.chinese: 它們能阻止風吹走沙石和土壤。

sentences.english: They can stop the wind from blowing up sand and…
sentences.chinese: 它們能阻止風吹走沙石和土壤。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
